item.description:
Please join me for a happy hour in Cambridge. We haven't gone across the river in a while. It's time. I'll be at the upstairs bar wearing a red shirt.

I'm asking everyone to wear something red, so look for the crowd of people in red. It'll be easy to find us.

I'll get there around 6pm and I'll stay for a couple of hours, but feel free to come and go as you please.

There will be no group tab, so please maintain your own tab or pay as you go. People arrive and leave at various times, so a group tab doesn't work out well.

UPDATE: I'm sorry, I had forgotten to put in the restaurant's website when I originally posted this event. Here it is:

http://www.daedalusha...

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a red shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear something red.
item.name: Happy Hour in Cambridge
